dr.app.beauti.generator
Interface ComponentGenerator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AncestralStatesComponentGenerator, BaseComponentGenerator, ContinuousComponentGenerator, DiscreteTraitsComponentGenerator, DolloComponentGenerator, HierarchicalModelComponentGenerator, SequenceErrorModelComponentGenerator, TipDateSamplingComponentGenerator
public interface ComponentGenerator

This interface is for generators of model components that need to insert XML at various places throughout the document. The implementation needs to return whether it wishes to make use of an insertion point and then generate code for that insertion point. Most implementations will be derived from the abstract BaseComponent.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

generateAtInsertionPoint

void generateAtInsertionPoint(Generator generator,
                              ComponentGenerator.InsertionPoint point,
                              java.lang.Object item,
                              XMLWriter writer)
Called to allow the component to generate at the particular insertion point. For some insertion points (currently only 'IN_TAXON') the specific item is given.

Parameters:
generator - the calling generator
point - the insertion point
item - a reference to the item being generated (or null if not applicable)
writer - the XMLWriter
